overview: Marni, 35 years old, a village woman who is very happy because she was accepted to work at the Merapi Theatre.  After just a week of work, cinemas are closed due to the pandemic.  Employees were mowed down, sails had to be lowered.  Cinema for sale.  This is a story about how Marni tries to maintain the only screen in the cinema with all her efforts.
title: Layar
